text_snack_mustbenum: Darajar dole ne ta zama lamba!
text_snack_toobig: Valueimar da aka zaɓa ta yi girma sosai!
text_snack_toosmall: Valueimar da aka zaɓa ta yi ƙarami kaɗan!
text_settings_showadd: Nuna maballin "ƙara" a cikin manyan fayiloli
text_importexport_content: Anan zaku iya shigo da fitarwa bayananku.
text_error_loadfile: kuskure: ba zai iya ɗaukar fayil ba.
text_error_fileformat: kuskure: tsarin fayil ba daidai bane
text_help_content:
Bayanan kula shine aikace-aikace don adanawa da tsara bayanan kula.

Don ƙirƙirar sabon bayanin kula, ko sabon babban fayil, latsa alamar "ƙari": zaɓi tsakanin bayanin rubutu da babban fayil, saka taken kuma ƙarshe abun ciki, sannan danna adana don adana canje-canje, ko latsa share don share bayanin kula, ko komawa don tsallake canje-canje amma kiyaye bayanin kula.

Latsa maɓallin "buɗe" kusa da bayanin kula don buɗe abubuwan da ke da alaƙa .

Latsa madannin "kara" a cikin babban fayil dan kara sabon abu a ciki.

Don bayanin kula da manyan fayilolin biyu, danna maballin "gyara" don gyara su, latsa "matsa baya" don musanya matsayi da abinda ya gabata, latsa maballin "matsa gaba" don musanyar matsayi tare da abu na gaba, latsa maɓallin "matsa sama" don matsar da ɓangaren daga cikin fayil ɗin da yake a halin yanzu, ko latsa maɓallin "matsa ƙasa" don matsar da ɓangaren cikin ƙaramin fayil mai zuwa.

A cikin menu na saitunan, mai sauƙin shiga bayan danna gunkin "saitunan", zaku iya ɓoye ko nuna gyara, motsi da ƙari madannin ion.

Don shigo ko fitar da bayanan kula, latsa gunkin shigowa / fitarwa. Za a shigo da bayanan kula ko fitar da su a cikin fayil ɗin JSON takamaiman wannan aikace-aikacen. Lokacin shigo da bayanan daga fayil, za a goge bayanan yanzu kuma a sake rubuta su.

Bayanan kula shi ne Aikace-aikacen Yanar Gizon Ci Gaban, wanda ke nufin cewa yana gudana cikin mai bincike. Lokacin da ka girka shi, yayin da ba a nuna abubuwan binciken ba, har yanzu yana gudana a cikin mai bincike. Ana adana bayanan kula a cikin adreshin mai bincike don yankin bayanan.marcoparrone.com. LocalStorage na aiki lafiya tare da masu bincike na Chrome, Edge da Firefox. Wasu masu bincike zasu iya shareShagon gida bayan wani lokaci. Android ta tsoho yana amfani da Chrome, Windows ta tsoho yana amfani da Edge. Bayanan kula a halin yanzu baya tallafawa kan samfuran Apple. Tare da manufar taimakawa don hana asarar bayanan bayanan, ana ba da shawarar yin ajiyar ajiya ta amfani da aikin "fitarwa", duk lokacin da kuka yi wasu gyare-gyare waɗanda ba ku son rasawa.
text_about_content1:
Hakkin mallaka © 2017,2019,2020,2021 Marco Parrone.
Dukkan hakkoki. ”pp AMMA BA A TA'BATAR DA GARANTIN SAMUN KASUWANCI BA, KYAUTA A KASANCEWA TA KASANCEWA MUTANE DA RASHIN YIN RUFEWA. BABU WANI ABU DA ZAI YI WA MALAMAI KO MASU KWADAYI A CIKIN KWADAYI DUK WANI LAIFI, LALACEWA KO SAURAN LAYYA, KO A HANYAR KWAQIQI, TAUYA KO WATA, TA FITO DAGA, TA WAJE KO TA HADAWA DA SOFTWARE KO AMFANI KO SAURAN MAGANA SOFTWARE.
text_about_content2: WANNAN HIDIMAR NA KUNSAN FASSARA DA GOOGLE YAYI MAKA. GOOGLE YAYI FADA DA DUKKAN GARANTI DANGANE DA FASSARA, BAYANAI KO AIKI, GAME DA KOWANE GARANTI NA INGANTA, AMINCI, DA KOWANE GARANTI NA HANKALIN SANA'A, KYAUTA A BANGAREN NUKA DA NON.
text_about_content3:
An fassara wannan ƙa'idodin yanar gizon don saukakawarku ta amfani da software na fassarar da Google Translate ke bayarwa. Anyi ƙoƙari mai ma'ana don samar da ingantacciyar fassara, kodayake, babu fassarar atomatik mai kyau kuma ba ana nufin maye gurbin masu fassarar ɗan adam ba. An bayar da fassarori a matsayin sabis ga masu amfani da gidan yanar gizon marcoparrone.com, kuma ana bayar da su "kamar yadda yake." Babu wani garantin kowane iri, ko dai an bayyana ko a bayyane, da aka yi game da daidaito, aminci, ko daidaito na duk fassarar da aka yi daga Ingilishi zuwa kowane yare. Wasu abubuwan (kamar su hotuna, bidiyo, Filashi, da sauransu) mai yiwuwa ba za a fassara su daidai ba saboda iyakokin software ɗin fassarar.

Rubutun hukuma shi ne shafin yanar gizon Ingilishi. Duk wani bambancin ra'ayi ko bambance-bambance da aka kirkira a cikin fassarar ba abin ɗaurawa bane kuma ba shi da wani tasiri na doka don bin doka ko dalilai na tilastawa. Idan duk wata tambaya ta taso dangane da daidaiton bayanin da ke cikin gidan yanar gizon da aka fassara, koma zuwa shafin yanar gizon Ingilishi wanda shine aikin hukuma.
